title: Curried Pork with Pineapple Stir Fry
ingredients: ['1kg pork, beef or chicken, sliced', '1 (432g) tin pineapple chunks', 'olive oil as needed', '5 cloves garlic, peeled', '1/2 onion, sliced', '1 tablespoon curry powder', '1 tablespoon dried thyme', '1/2 tablespoon paprika', '1/2 teaspoon salt', '4 tablespoons soy sauce', '1 tablespoon cornflour', '75ml water']
